definition: within the party (esp. Chinese communist party)

sentences.english: Keeping close contact with the masses is a good tradition of our Party.
sentences.chinese: 密切联系群众是我们党的优良传统。

sentences.english: The party was kept together by personal loyalty to the leader.
sentences.chinese: 这个党是靠对领袖的个人忠诚而维系在一起的。

sentences.english: I imagine that Party propaganda people will not pursue this line, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我不相信党的宣传人员会采信这一点。

sentences.english: He was always loyal to the Party.
Labour says…The process followed by National has been anti-democratic.
sentences.chinese: 工党认为，由国家党主导的这个立法过程是反民主的。

sentences.english: The three leading cores have developed the unique theory of party building.
sentences.chinese: 党的三代领导核心形成了各自独创性的党风建设理论。

sentences.english: It is the striking theme of the ruling history and country history that people are the masters.
sentences.chinese: 人民当家作主成为党的执政史和国史的鲜明主题。

sentences.english: The rain eventually returns during the party, and everyone except the women run for shelter.
sentences.chinese: 大雨期间，最终的回报党，大家除了妇女跑警报。

sentences.english: There are many rays of innovation between lines in the Reprot of the Sixteenth Congress.
sentences.chinese: 党的“十六大”报告字里行间处处闪烁着创新的光芒。

sentences.english: The 16th National Party Congress put forward for strengthen the party's ability to govern.
sentences.chinese: 党的十六届四中全会提出加强党的执政能力建设。

sentences.english: The 16th National Party Congress put forward for strengthen the party's ability to govern.
sentences.chinese: 党的十六届四中全会提出加强党的执政能力建设。

sentences.english: The Party cannot live and develop if it isolates itself from the non-party masses.
sentences.chinese: 党脱离了非党群众就不能存在和发展。

sentences.english: He gave his all to the Party.
The G.O.P. used to be the party of business.
sentences.chinese: 过去，美国老大党曾是一个支持商业发展的党派。

sentences.english: The working class represents the CPC's strongest and most reliable class foundation.
sentences.chinese: 我国工人阶级是我们党最坚实最可靠的阶级基础。

sentences.english: Whether our lovable party did die in line of duty this professor locates the martyr?
sentences.chinese: 我们可爱的党是否把这位因公殉职的教授定位烈士呢？

definition: within the party (esp. Chinese communist party)
Communist Party/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3]
the mass line, CCP term for Party policy aimed at broadening and cultivating contacts with the masses
